scripts.dev: pwd && concurrently -n "docker,frontend,backend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "pwd && docker-compose up" "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && yarn watch"
scripts.dev-build: pwd && concurrently -n "docker,frontend,backend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "pwd && docker-compose up --build" "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && yarn watch"
scripts.lint: yarn run tslint 'backend/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' && yarn run eslint 'frontend/src/**/*.{js,jsx}'
